column4: Hi, I'm trying to create a C app that will put data into a postgres database however I'm having a hard time determining how to setup autotools such that I use the shared library.  From what I can tell I cannot use pkgconfig to do this just yet.
Is there a better forum for my previous question about c programming?
since you are working with postgresql, go download some of its contrib packages will help
thank you for the advice I'll check it out.
